title: Patch Notes
content: HP but remain alive. Fixed a rare issue where druids could not revert their Wild Shape when playing on a save with mods. Enemies will now properly drop loot when dying from having one of their ability scores reduced to 0. Fixed how the Chest of the Mundane handles item stacks higher than its maximum. (It should no longer gobble up your enormous coin stack and spit back a measly 21 cups in return.) Fixed a bug that prevented monks' Shadow Step from giving Advantage for rogues' Sneak Attack. Fixe
